Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

Pong.name: Pong
Pong.description: The garlycanthrope releases a puff of strong-smelling powder in a 30-foot radius. For the next 8 hours, any non-garlycanthrope creature that passes through the area has disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) and Wisdom (Survival) checks made to locate and/or track any creature using smell for 1 hour.

Eyes of the Grave.name: Eyes of the Grave
Eyes of the Grave.description: The garlycanthrope always knows the location of any undead within 60 feet of it that isn't behind total cover and that isn't protected from divination magic. It growls gently in the direction to warn its owner.

False Appearance.name: False Appearance
False Appearance.description: While motionless, the garlycanthrope is indistinguishable from a normal head of garlic.

Garlicol.name: Garlicol
Garlicol.description: Due to the garlycanthrope's pungent aroma, vampires and their spawn have disadvantage on attack rolls while within 15 feet of it.

Nose of the Changed.name: Nose of the Changed
Nose of the Changed.description: The garlycanthrope can smell the presence of any shapechangers within 120 feet of it. It gives a soft bark in the direction from which their scent comes.
